gameplay.notes: Water Pokemon in Base Set include Squirtle, Wartortle, Blastoise, Psyduck, Golduck, Poliwag, Poliwhirl, Poliwrath, Tentacool, Tentacruel, Seel, Dewgong, Staryu, Starmie, Magikarp, Gyarados, and Lapras. Rain Dance is a tier 1 archetype that can attach multiple Water Energy per turn with Blastoise. Water is strong against Fire types but weak to Lightning and Grass. Energy Retrieval helps recover discarded Water Energy.
